verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* unto \w me|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* openeth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* \w among|strong="H1060"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w as|strong="H1121"\w* well \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*: \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H6942"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* mine.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* strong \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H3027"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w leavened|strong="H2557"\w* \w bread|strong="H2557"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w new|strong="H2320"\w* corn.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chanaanite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Hethite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Amorrhite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Hevite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* floweth \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, thou shalt celebrate \w this|strong="H2088"\w* manner \w of|strong="H0776"\w* sacred rites \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* solemnity \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w leavened|strong="H2557"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* thee, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy coasts.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* always \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

Thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* observance \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w set|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Chanaanite, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* thee:

Thou shalt \w set|strong="H0834"\w* apart \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* openeth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* first \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* forth \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*: \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* sex, thou shalt consecrate \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H0518"\w* ass thou shalt change \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w do|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, thou shalt kill \w it|strong="H0518"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* thou shalt \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w price|strong="H6299"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* thee \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*? thou shalt \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w With|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* strong \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Pharao \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* openeth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* sex, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* hung \w between|strong="H0996"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* remembrance: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* strong \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Pharao \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w led|strong="H5148"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*: \w thinking|strong="H0559"\w* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w repent|strong="H7725"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w wars|strong="H4421"\w* arise \w against|strong="H4421"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w led|strong="H5437"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, which \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Red \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* armed \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Josephâ€™s|strong="H3130"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H0430"\w* adjured \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w carry|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* hence \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5523"\w* \w marching|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* Socoth they \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* Etham \w in|strong="H2583"\w* the utmost coasts of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* shew \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w guide|strong="H5148"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* both \w times|strong="H6440"\w*.

There \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w by|strong="H0784"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w by|strong="H0784"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
